description: Weekly laboratory exercises involving preparation, experiments with a partner, and analysis of results. Includes prelab work and focuses on experimental safety, data interpretation, and graphical representation.
Two invigilated tests (weeks 3 and 5) assessing weeks 1-4 content. Each test includes 4 questions on mechanics, waves, and related topics. Practice questions with feedback are provided.
Two invigilated tests (weeks 8 and 10) assessing weeks 5,7-9 content. Each test includes 4 questions on electromagnetism, optics, and related topics. Practice questions with feedback are provided.
